main event: Two unidentified flying objects were sighted over Las Vegas, Nevada on 15 July 1952.
interesting points: The objects were white in color and shaped like a cigar or tube.
The objects were moving at a high speed, estimated between 600-700 mph.
The objects were tracked by radar at an altitude of up to 20,000 feet and a maximum speed of 1700 mph.
The objects were observed by multiple witnesses, including city police who received numerous calls from citizens.
The appearance and behavior of the objects were not typical of known aircraft, leading investigators to consider it one of the more interesting sightings of 1952.
sighted object: two cigar or tube-shaped white objects
